decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers.Container
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.containers.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ContainedItem>

    public class Inventory
extends Container
    Extends the Container class and provides an interface for player-specific transactions. Created by bjwood on 25/08/2014.

        Checks if the inventory contains at least the given amount of currency
        Parameters:

        Returns:
